post.title: Github Copilot Injection to RCE
post.excerpt: The folks at Trail of Bits have an interesting post on how they tricked Github Copilot into installing a backdoor which allows remote code execution. Lovely! https://blog.trailofbits.com/2025/08/06/prompt-injection-engineering-for-attackers-exploiting-github-copilot/
post.content: The folks at Trail of Bits have an interesting post on how they tricked Github Copilot into installing a backdoor which allows remote code execution. Lovely! https://blog.trailofbits.com/2025/08/06/prompt-injection-engineering-for-attackers-exploiting-github-copilot/
